All coordinates are approximate. The curve appears to be sinusoidal. Moving from left to right:

The curve begins at point (0 comma 3).

The curve trends down to the right gradually then steeply, crosses the x axis at (2 pi over 3 comma 0), and levels to a minimum point at (pi comma negative 1).

At point (pi comma negative 1), the curve trends up to the right gradually then steeply, crosses the x axis at (4 pi over 3 comma 0), and levels to end at point (2 pi comma 3).
